Der Titel bringt die Kernaussage der Gra: the title brings the core message of the graphic to the point, eg. 'The CVP crashes'.
Der Untertitel benennt präzise, um welch: the subtitle gives a precise name of what election is concerned.
Falls eine Prozenthürde exisitert, bitte: if a percentage hurdle exists, please enter the number.
Die Veränderung von der vergangenen zur: the change from the past to the current election is then calculated automatically.
